subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise scored 37 seconds into overtime to cap a furious late rally by the Devils on Monday night in a 4-3 victory over the Pittsburgh Penguins at Prudential Center in Newark.
snippet: Zach Parise scored 37 seconds into overtime to cap a furious late rally by the Devils on Monday night in a 4-3 victory over the Pittsburgh Penguins at Prudential Center in Newark.
